links.title: $NVCR Novocure Announces Closing of $150 Million Revolving Credit Facility with a Syndicate of Relationship Banks
links.description: Novocure (NASDAQ: NVCR), a global oncology company working to extend survival in some of the most aggressive forms of cancer, today announced the closing of a new $150 million senior secured revolving credit facility with JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. as administrative agent and a syndicate of three relationship banks.

links.title: Novocure Ltd (NVCR) 10K Annual Reports & 10Q SEC Filings | Last10K
links.description: Novocure Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2019 Financial Results and Provides Company Update Quarterly net revenues of $99.2 million, representing 42 percent growth versus the fourth quarter 2018 and 8 percent growth versus the third quarter 2019 Second quarter of positive net income with $0.04 in earnings per share Four phase 3 pivotal clinical trials ongoing creating the potential for substantial market expansion St.

https://www.stocktitan.net/news/NVCR/novocure-announces-closing-of-150-million-revolving-credit-facility-st88hvkb0cxo.html

links.title: Novocure Announces Closing of $150 Million Revolving Credit | StockTitan.net
links.description: ST. HELIER, Jersey--()--Novocure (NASDAQ: NVCR), a global oncology company working to extend survival in some of the most aggressive forms of cancer, today announced the closing of a new $150 million senior secured revolving credit facility with JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. as administrative agent and a syndicate of three relationship banks.

messages.body:
$NVCR Novocure Announces Closing of $150 Million Revolving Credit Facility with a Syndicate of Relationship Banks 

https://newsfilter.io/a/e669548932bce36aaa887c4c8fe867ee

links.title: Novocure Announces Closing of $150 Million Revolving Credit Facility with a Syndicate of Relationship Banks
links.description: Novocure announced the closing of a new $150 million senior secured revolving credit facility with JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. as administrative agent and a syndicate of three relationship banks. Novocure may, subject to certain conditions and limitations, increase the revolving credit commitments outstanding under the revolving credit facility or incur new incremental term loans in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed an additional $100 million.

I am anticipating markets to sell off to the possibility of Kamala being the tie breaking vote in Senate...

links.title: A Second Senate Race in Georgia Heads to a January Runoff
links.description: As of Saturday morning, Georgia Republican Sen. David Perdue continues to hold a steady lead over his Democrat opponent, Jon Ossoff. Perdue has received 2,453, 679 votes and Ossoff, 2,357,910. They stand apart by 95,769 votes, or 1.9 percent. Unlike President Trump, Perdue has not seen his election night margin disintegrate.
